text: Sphingomonas jaspsi is a Gram-negative, aerobic, pleomorphic and motile bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from fresh water in Misasa in Japan.UniProt Sphingomonas jaspsi produces carotenoid. == Further reading == * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas jaspsi at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase japonica Category:Bacteria described in 2007
title: Sphingomonas jaspsi
